data.description: Basic communication skills; speaking, reading, writing modern Hebrew; elements of grammar and syntax.
data.title: FIRST SEMESTER HEBREW

data.description: Intensive study of the fundamental structure of Hebrew language, using the four language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) to improve Hebrew proficiency.  Grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary are incorporated into the daily activities, with an emphasis on speaking and using the language for communication. The Hebrew alphabet is also introduced.
data.title: SECOND SEMESTER INTENSIVE MODERN HEBREW
